alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 2:13PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. Johns, northeastern Putnam and southeastern Clay Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 213 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near George`s Lake, or 10 miles southwest of Green Cove Springs, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Green Cove Springs, Hastings, East Palatka, Fruit Cove, Picolata, Switzerland, Bostwick, Federal Point and Orange Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam
